project_descr:
Support for the coordination for the Rule of Law and Security Programme. Coordination and Support to Somali Security Sector Institutions and improved security and protection under the law
for all Somalis.

outputs.output_descr:
Coordination and Support to Somali Security Sector Institutions and improved security and protection under the law
for all Somalis.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
UN DEPT OF ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL AFFAIRS

outputs.output_descr: Somalis, especially vulnerable groups have better protection under the law, access to justice and greater understanding of the law and their rights.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

outputs.output_descr: New EC contribution as per contract agreement for the implementation of the Rule of Law and Security program throughout Somalia in the program specific areas of Coordination, Law Enforcement, DDR and Small Arms Control, and Judiciary.
